item.description:
Since it's short notice we'll just try to get together in a location roughly equidistant for most members. The point is to meet new faces and chat about our music and music technology interests. The venue has good food, drinks and beer. (If you like it.) There's also a Starbucks right around the corner if you have that addiction. :)

Feel free to bring laptops, ipods, CD's, questions, answers, and friends. If you want to share your music, great!

This location isn't set up for live music, so keep your live instruments at home. We are "digital musicians" after all.

----

Venue Website (menu, detailsed directions)
http://www.krazykarry...
item.how_to_find_us: I'm big, bald, bespectacled, bearded and sporting the laptop.
item.name: April Face Time Meetup
